summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5721 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 50, Replat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between East Howell Street and East Denny Way, from Boylston Avenue to the north and south alley in said block; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75561 as amended by Ordinance No. 76830, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
